childrenToInclude <- c(
  "Organisatorisches", "Hinweise", 
  "00-EinfuehrungInDieNumerik"
)
includeChild <- function(name, children=childrenToInclude, all=FALSE) {
    ifelse(all, TRUE, ifelse(name %in% children, TRUE, FALSE))
}
